attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to stop the Goverment allowing planning permission for these Large Supermarkets who are killing our country, because they can buy in bulk mainly from abroad in mass amounts, they have ruined the Town center's, Village shops, Farming, Manufactoring, we need to get rid of all these stores that have taken the monopoly. Buy British and lets get our country back on it's feet.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
